title: Catching Up With Rob Simmeljkaer, the Next Leader of the NYC Marathon
description: Rob Simmelkjaer was a top executive at ESPN and worked on air at NBC. As he prepares to take over New York Road Runners, he wants new races and to promote running as a tool for improving mental health.
dc:creator: Matthew Futterman

media:content.media:credit: Benjamin Norman for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Rob Simmelkjaer, the incoming chief executive of the New York Road Runners.
